content.rendered:
Directed by Raghava Lawrence

Written by Raghava Lawrence

Cast Raghava Lawrence (Raghava / Kaali). Oviya (Kavya). Vedhika (Priya (as Vedika)). Nikki Tamboli (Divya). Ri Djavi Alexandra (Rosie, Kaali’s love interest). Kovai Sarala (Raghava’s Mother). Soori (Govindaraju). Kabir Duhan Singh (Bhavani). Tarun Arora (Minister). Anupama Kumar (Radha (Kaali’s Mother)). Sriman (Raghava’s Brother). Devadarshini Chetan (Kamakshi). Aathma Patrick (Moorthy) . Ajay Ghosh (Police Officer). Sunita Gogoi (Dhivya).Anurag Maurya. Jackey Mishra (Ghost)

Languages Tamil. Telugu. Kannada

Producers Raghava Lawrence. Kalanidhi Maran. Hari Vishnu

Production Raghavendra Production. Sun Picture
